USE electric_vehicle_ldw
GO

--CREA LA VISTA vw_vehicle_registration
--los datos se encuentran en el directorio silver/vw_vehicle_registration particionados por a√±o y fecha     
DROP VIEW IF EXISTS silver.vw_vehicle_registration
GO

CREATE VIEW silver.vw_vehicle_registration
AS
SELECT 
    result.filepath(1) AS year,
    result.filepath(2) AS month,
    result.*
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'silver/vehicle_registration/year=*/month=*/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'electric_vehicle_src',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) WITH(
        vehicle_id           INT,
        location_id          SMALLINT,
        propietary_id        INT,
        dolVehicle_id        INT,
        registration_date    DATETIME2(7)
    )AS [result]
GO

SELECT COUNT(*) 
FROM silver.vw_vehicle_registration 
WHERE year = '2024' and month = '01';
